rounds.prompt: The Ordinary World: Every morning, King Brightwing assembled his subjects to ___________ - 6 words
The Heart's Desire: Must have a single rhyme! - 6 words
Darkness Descends: King Brightwing could only watch as his clan suffered ______ - 5 words
